cheatsheet.title: Deleting a patient from the Decision Support database

intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to delete a patient from the Decision Support application database. This action is permanent and removes the patient from the database, so there is a confirmation dialog that will give you a chance to change your mind.

item.title: Select a patient in the Patients view
item.description: Select the patient that you wish to delete.

item.title: Delete the patient
item.description: Select the Edit -> Delete Patient command.

item.title: Alternative method to delete patient
item.description: Right click on the patient with your mouse, and Select the Edit -> Delete patient command from the pop-up menu.
